text: Carimagua Airport is an airport serving the village of Carimagua in the Meta Department of Colombia. The runway is south of Orocué, the nearest town. The Carimauga non-directional beacon (Ident: CRG) is located on the field.Carimagua NDB ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Carimagua *OurAirports - Carimagua *FallingRain - Carimagua Airport Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Carimagua Airport
